name: @continuum/jtag-test-bench
description: JTAG Test Bench - Standalone Example App

scripts.start: npm run clean:all && npm run build && npm run version:bump && npm run dev
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:ports && npm run clean:logs && npm run clean:screenshots && npm run clean:dist
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:browser
scripts.build:server: npx tsc src/minimal-server.ts --outDir dist --rootDir src --target ES2020 --module ES2020 --moduleResolution node --skipLibCheck --esModuleInterop
